name: places/ChIJsab0tn6TwokRJn7K9mBl64g
formattedAddress: 60 E 42nd St Suite 4600, New York, NY 10165, USA
adrFormatAddress: 60 E 42nd St Suite 4600, New York, NY 10165, USA

originalText.text:
This year Peiser Floors refinished some 20 year old cherry floors in my home. I used them because they had done a good job on other floors in my home 25 years ago.

This time was very different. Barry pressured me to Zelle him the final payment before I had been able to see the finished product, and against my better judgment, I did so, as I trusted Peiser to do the right thing based on my prior experience 25 years ago.

Peiser Floors' workmanship was sub-standard. There were gouges in the floor made by the sanding machine and scrapes and gouges from hand sanding. They came back to "fix" the problems and absolutely nothing changed. The gouges and scrapes were still there same as before and there were drips in the polyurethane applied, along with debris on the floor that was polyurethaned over. In addition, damage was done to surrounding custom cabinetry. I sent photos to Barry.

I asked for my final payment back and Barry promised to come back to see and make things right. After following up with him for over 9 months via phone and endless emails and being promised time and again by Barry that he would come back and take a look and would rectify the situation, nothing has happened.

This company has really gone downhill from the last time I used them . Extremely poor workmanship on a job which should have been simple, poor follow through, pressured selling and very poor customer service.

I would not recommend this company.

originalText.text: My wood floors were covered by carpeting for years. I didn't know how beautifully Peiser could restore them. Wish I'd learned about Peiser years ago.

text.text: My wood floors were covered by carpeting for years. I didn't know how beautifully Peiser could restore them. Wish I'd learned about Peiser years ago.

originalText.text: This is the original Peiser Floors. They installed my floors 15 years ago and they still look like new. I highly recommend their services. Ask for Barry.

text.text: This is the original Peiser Floors. They installed my floors 15 years ago and they still look like new. I highly recommend their services. Ask for Barry.

originalText.text: Amazing installers. I have worked with them many times.

text.text: Amazing installers. I have worked with them many times.

originalText.text: One of the best. Amazing work that they stand by...

text.text: One of the best. Amazing work that they stand by...
